ygData.subject: Re: Mould Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Let me c... I have killed 6 SG, 10 Spectres, 3 Griffins and 5 HGs. With 2 druids (nukers/healer and SoWers) and 1 wizzie. ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical
ygData.messageBody:
Let me c... I have killed 6 SG, 10 Spectres, 3 Griffins and 5 HGs. With 2
druids (nukers/healer and SoWers) and 1 wizzie.

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Wah lan, then I think the whole damn place must be heavily camped. In this
> kinda situation, I think the only way we can win is to make full use of
> nukers - situation when BIG FIRE WINS ;)
>
> If we can get Leshrec, Ling, FF and myself for some big bombing (ard 1400
> dam in 1 round of nuking), maybe we can stand a chance to get it ;)
>
> Hey, where are we going for some SG or griffin hunting? I heard SG got
> 3000-5000 HP? Based on the above, 4 nukes from each of the bombers will
> inflict 5600 dam, not yet including damage inflict by tanks, PROVIDED our
> spells are not resisted. Guess it's time for some BIG action, hehe.
>
> Ziltus
>

> > > > >
> > > > > > When one of them hit 51, the rest of them will not increase
> anymore?
> > > > > i believe ziltus ask this question b4... but since i have one of
> them
> > > > > in the 40s, i should know bout it and start working on something,
> > > > > otherwise the rest will not increase anymore... so ziltus dont tell
> > > > > me u just spend one bloody day do nothing but just keep casting
> > > > > spells?
> > > > >
> > > > > When one specialisation hits 51, the rest will not increase
> > > > > BEYOND 50. They will still increase if below 50, but will cap out
> at
> > > > > 50.
> > > > >
> > > > > The one that hits 51 first will go on to your level cap.
> > > > >
